HeroType.Arts.Name: Arts
HeroType.Arts.Flavour:
There once was a fella named Terry,
    Who thought that English sounded rather cheery.
    The top of his class,
    He easily passed.
    And now he works at the dairy.
HeroType.Commerce.Name: Commerce
HeroType.Commerce.Flavour: Commerce students understand the ins and outs of profit and loss, EBITDA etc.
HeroType.Eng.Name: Engineering
HeroType.Eng.Flavour: An engineering student's hygiene is usually as good as their social skills, this can be used to their advantage.
HeroType.CompSci.Name: Computer Science
HeroType.CompSci.Flavour: Mainly introverts, computer science majors spend their spare time honing their computer skills instead of socialising.
HeroType.Law.Name: Law
HeroType.Law.Flavour: Law students are masters of twisting words and fudging numbers.
HeroType.Maths.Name: Maths/Stats
HeroType.Maths.Flavour: Maths and Stats students manipulate numbers, and letters in place of numbers, in ways that are unimaginable. Do they feel pity in others suffering through Maths and Stats courses?
HeroType.Science.Name: Sciences
HeroType.Science.Flavour: Chemists, Physicists, Biologists etc can concoct, analyse, modify the physical world around them.
